Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory668.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "I knew you'd be here. I came straight over after leaving the Science Council.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A familiar cold voice sounds behind you. Turning around, you see the expected figure in red.'}
{2: "You're early. We agreed on a later time.", 3: '7'}
{2: 'Did you finish your system module upgrade?', 3: '8'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "About halfway, I'd say. But I managed to finish all the important parts in time for the Double Seventh Festival.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "The rest of the lifestyle modules still need fine-tuning. It can't all be set up in one go... This frame is still too focused on combat.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera suddenly crosses her arms, looking intrigued.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Still, since you insisted, I upgraded the taste module first.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Installing such high-sensitivity sensors was one of the most extravagant things I've done in years. Thanks for sponsoring it. I'll consider it a gift from you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "So, what's your real plan?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'We can do a taste test right now.', 3: '17'}
{2: 'I took a quick look around earlier, and...', 3: '18'}
{3: 'You pull out a stack of colorful vouchers from behind your back.'}
{2: 'These are tasting vouchers for nearly every food stall here.', 3: '21'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Let me guess, you want to test how well the taste module's working?", 4: '1'}
{2: "Exactly. You try each one, describe the flavor, and I'll take notes. Sound good?", 3: '24'}
{3: 'Vera narrows her eyes and flicks a finger lightly against the stack of vouchers.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Fine. Since I'm in a good mood today, we'll test as we walk.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory802.jpg'}
{2: "Let's start with something mild.", 3: '31'}
{3: "You lead Vera to the nearest food stall and exchange a voucher for a small box of Lovers' Delights. She picks up two and pops them into her mouth."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'This is supposed to be mild? The taste module is really amplifying everything.', 4: '1'}
{2: "What does it taste like? How's the texture?", 3: '37'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Soft dough. Classic Kowloong-style. One's salted egg yolk, the other sweet cheese. Nothing special. I'm not big on sweets.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'How about this?', 3: '40'}
{3: 'You hand her a bag of puffed snacks.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Strongly sour. Some kind of pickled... kimchi-flavored chips? I remember this taste from the Military Academy training.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Buy a few extra bags. I want to bring them back to Cerberus.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As she says that, her gaze shifts to the nearby drink stall. The mechanoid vendor shrinks back into the corner under her piercing stare.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'You sell coffee?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mechanoid Vendor', 3: 'Y-yes, we do. Only plain black coffee though...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Perfect. No sugar. Bring me a cup.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The vendor quickly hands her a small paper cup. Vera takes a sip and finally looks satisfied.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Hah, bitter coffee really is the best. Helps keep you sharp. Way more interesting than the soft flavors earlier.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The familiar bitterness intensifies on her tongue, and the sensation pleases her.'}
{2: 'If you want something more intense... How about this?', 3: '60'}
{3: 'You spot a stall with a banner: "Latest Electrolyte Flavors." One label catches your eye, and you hand the product to Vera.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Electrolyte drink... seawater flavor? Your creativity has officially crossed into absurdity. Alright, I'll try it.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She says "try," but Vera promptly takes a large gulp.'}
{3: 'Then, she pauses.'}
{3: 'Vera wipes her mouth.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "...Hah. Before I became a Construct, I'd never even seen the sea. Since then I've swum in it plenty of times... but this is the first time I've actually tasted it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "So that's what it's like... a harsh mix of salt and bitterness—overpoweringly salt, to the point of being foul.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Vera's expression softens suddenly, as if remembering something."}

{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Before the Punishing outbreak, eating was just another chore to me—just a way to refuel. Maybe it was to punish me. After becoming a Construct, I lost the ability to really taste anything.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Sour, sweet, bitter, spicy, salty... It's been so long. But I've finally tasted all five again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Still, it feels completely different from back then.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera looks at you again, directly into your eyes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'You really are impossible. Always causing trouble, always giving me a headache.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'But for this, thank you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Without warning, she steps forward, grabs the back of your neck, and leans in. Her lips brush your ear.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "There's one last flavor I want to try.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory843.jpg'}
{3: 'Her sharp canines catch your earlobe, then bite down hard.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory802.jpg'}
{3: 'A thin trail of blood trickles from between her teeth.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Salty, metallic, not too different from seawater. Just as I thought.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'If you think those taste the same, your taste module needs work.', 3: '116', 4: '(Bite back)', 5: '119'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Doesn't matter. This street is long, with plenty more tastes to try. We can test as long as you like. I'll stay until you're satisfied.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Little Commandant, from now on, your time belongs to me too. No objections, right?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory802.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory802.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Ooh, that's some sharp teeth.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Touching the bite mark on her ear, Vera suddenly bursts out laughing.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Seems you're also quite interested in these strange flavors.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Then, let me accompany you to try more. How does that sound?', 4: '1'}
